title: Which Smartphone Do They ACTUALLY Use? --- MKBHD, Austin Evans, Linus + More
description:
The burning question that the entire tech community wants an answer to... Which smartphone do prominent tech influencers like MKBHD, UrAvgConsumer, Austin Evans, Linus Tech Tips, Dom Esposito, Mrwhosetheboss and Unbox Therapy choose to carry daily. No fluff necessary, which smartphone and why? iPhone X, iPhone 8, Galaxy Note 8, Galaxy S8, Galaxy S8+, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL, OnePlus 5T... Something else??? Find out in this unprecedented video!

In order of appearance...

Dom Esposito
https://www.youtube.com/macmixing

Austin Evans
https://www.youtube.com/austinevans

https://www.youtube.com/user/LinusTechTips

https://www.youtube.com/user/UrAvgConsumer

MKBHD (Marques Brownlee)
https://www.youtube.com/mkbhd

Mrwhosetheboss (Arun Maini)
https://www.youtube.com/user/Mrwhosetheboss
